<fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell/> <fo:table-cell text-align="center"> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Name"/> <xsl:if test="Street != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="Street"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="PlaceName != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="PlaceName"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Zip != '' or City != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="Zip"/> <xfd:field xpath="City"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="CountryDisplayName != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="CountryDisplayName"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber != ''"> - V-tal: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber"/> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto"> <fo:block> <xsl:if test="Phone != ''"> <fo:inline keep-together.within-line="always"> Telefon: <xfd:field xpath="Phone"/> </fo:inline> </xsl:if> <xsl:if <xsl:if test="Phone != '' or Email != ''"> - </xsl:if> <fo:inline keep-together.within-line="always"> Heimasíða: <xfd:field xpath="Website"/> </fo:inline> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> space-after="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row height="30mm" font-size="24pt" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" display-align="after"> <!-- Header Logo --> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <fo:external-graphic fo:id="Logo" content-height="scale-down-to-fit" height="25mm" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Header Title --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block font-size="24pt" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" id="Title">Rykker 1</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row height="5mm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="3"/> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <!-- Sub-Header Left --> <fo:table-cell> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Partner/Partner/Address/Address"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Street"/> </fo:block> <xsl:if test="PlaceName != ''"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PlaceName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:if> <fo:block><xfd:field xpath="Zip"/> <xfd:field xpath="City"/></fo:block> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Country/Country/DisplayName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Sub-Header Right --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> Dagseting: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/FiscalDate"/> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PaymentMeans/PaymentMeans"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="LongDescription"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!-- Content --> <fo:block space-after="10mm"> <fo:block id="SubTitle">Gjaldstreytir</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>Við gjøgnumgongd av bókhald okkara hava vit lagt til merkis, at vit ikki hava móttikið inngjalding Tygara fyri niðanfyri standandi gjaldkomnum fakturum. Tí senda vit hesa áminning.</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PartnerPost/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="50mm" margin-left="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Fakturi:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Dato:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Gjaldsdagur:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Upphædd:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/TotalAmount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:for-each> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>Hava Tygum longu goldið gjaldkomnu upphæddina, kunnu Tygum síggja burtur frá hesari áminning. Hava Tygum gloymt at gjalda rokning(ar) Tygara, heita vit á Tygum at gjalda beinanvegin.</fo:block> <fo:block id="SubTitle" space-before="5mm">Oversigt over alle åbne faktura</fo:block> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="100%"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(3)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-header> <fo:table-row id="TableHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Dato</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Gjaldsdagur</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Fakturi</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Tekstur</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Upphædd</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <fo:table-body> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/UnsettledPartnerPosts/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PostTypeTranslated"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Amount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell id="TableLine" number-columns-spanned="5"/> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/LedgerPosts/LedgerPost"> <xsl:if test="LedgerAccount = 'Xena_Domain_Income_Accounts_Financial_Costs'"> <fo:block space-before="3mm"> Fyri hesari áminning roknast eitt gjald uppá <xfd:field xpath="-Amount"/>kr. </fo:block> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> <!-- InvoiceIdentification --> <xsl:if test="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block space-after="10mm" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" id="PaymentLines"> <fo:block>Ved betaling brug venligst betalings-ID:</fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block><xfd:field xpath="Identification"/></fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> </xsl:if> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

<!-- Posts --> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Posts/Specification"> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="13pt" padding-bottom="30px"> <xfd:field xpath="ArticleGroupDescription"></xfd:field> <fo:table margin-left="3px"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(30.0)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(15.0)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(17.5)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(17.5)" column-number="5"/> <fo:table-body>
<!-- Columnheaders --> <fo:table-row id="PostsHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Varenr.</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Beskrivelse</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Antal</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Gns. pris</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Værdi, total</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>
<!-- Posts --> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="ArticleStock/HistoricStockValueData"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="ArticleNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="ArticleDescription"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="AvailableQuantity" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="AverageCostPrice" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="TotalStockValue" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <fo:table> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row id="PostsHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="concat('Total: ',ArticleGroupDescription)" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="TotalArticleGroupValue" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> <fo:table> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row id="PostsHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> Total lagerværdi </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/GrandTotal" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

dynamic-value="concat('data:image/jpg;base64,',/Report/Logo)"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="Title" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="SubTitle" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/DarkHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="SubTitle" attribute="fo:font-size" value="14pt"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableHeader" attribute="fo:background-color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableHeader" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/InvertedTextColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableHeader" attribute="fo:display-align" value="center"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableHeader" attribute="fo:height" value="6mm"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableHeader" attribute="fo:padding" value="0.5mm"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableLine" attribute="fo:border-before" value="1pt solid"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TableLine" attribute="fo:border-before-color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <!-- Layout --> <fo:layout-master-set> <fo:simple-page-master master-name="A4" page-width="210mm" page-height="297mm"> <fo:region-body region-name="xsl-region-body" margin="20mm"/> <fo:region-after region-name="xsl-region-after" extent="25mm" padding-left="20mm" padding-right="20mm"/> </fo:simple-page-master> </fo:layout-master-set> <!-- Page --> <fo:page-sequence master-reference="A4" font-family="Calibri, Microsoft YaHei"> <!-- Footer --> <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after" font-size="11pt"> <fo:table> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(5)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell/> <fo:table-cell text-align="center"> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Name"/> <xsl:if test="Street != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="Street"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="PlaceName != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="PlaceName"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Zip != '' or City != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="Zip"/> <xfd:field xpath="City"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="CountryDisplayName != ''"> - <xfd:field xpath="CountryDisplayName"/> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber != ''"> - CVR: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber"/> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto"> <fo:block> <xsl:if test="Phone != ''"> <fo:inline keep-together.within-line="always"> Telefon: <xfd:field xpath="Phone"/> </fo:inline> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Email != ''"> <xsl:if test="Phone != ''"> - </xsl:if> <fo:inline keep-together.within-line="always"> E-Mail: <xfd:field xpath="Email"/> </fo:inline> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="Website != ''"> <xsl:if test="Phone != '' or Email != ''"> - </xsl:if> <fo:inline keep-together.within-line="always"> Hjemmeside: <xfd:field xpath="Website"/> </fo:inline> </xsl:if> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> Side <fo:page-number format="1"/>/<fo:page-number-citation format="1" ref-id="xf#theEnd"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:static-content> <!-- Body --> <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body" font-size="11pt"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="100%" padding-before="-15mm" space-after="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row height="30mm" font-size="24pt" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" display-align="after"> <!-- Header Logo --> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <fo:external-graphic fo:id="Logo" content-height="scale-down-to-fit" height="25mm" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Header Title --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block font-size="24pt" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" id="Title">Rykker 1</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row height="5mm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="3"/> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <!-- Sub-Header Left --> <fo:table-cell> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Partner/Partner/Address/Address"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Street"/> </fo:block> <xsl:if test="PlaceName != ''"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PlaceName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:if> <fo:block><xfd:field xpath="Zip"/> <xfd:field xpath="City"/></fo:block> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Country/Country/DisplayName"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> <!-- Sub-Header Right --> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> Dato: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/FiscalDate"/> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PaymentMeans/PaymentMeans"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="LongDescription"/> </fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <!-- Content --> <fo:block space-after="10mm"> <fo:block id="SubTitle">Betalingspåmindelse</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>Ved gennemgang af vort bogholderi har vi bemærket, at vi ikke har modtaget Deres indbetaling af nedenstående forfaldne faktura. Derfor sender vi denne betalingspåmindelse.</fo:block> <fo:block> </fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/PartnerPost/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="50mm" margin-left="10mm"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Faktura:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Dato:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Forfald:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Beløb:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Amount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </xsl:for-each> <fo:block> </fo:block> <fo:block>Har De allerede betalt det skyldige beløb inden for de sidste fem hverdage, kan De se bort fra denne henvendelse. Hvis De har glemt at betale Deres regning(er), beder vi Dem straks indbetale beløbet.</fo:block> <fo:block id="SubTitle" space-before="5mm">Oversigt over alle åbne faktura</fo:block> <fo:table table-layout="fixed" width="100%"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(3)"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(1)"/> <fo:table-header> <fo:table-row id="TableHeader"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Dato</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Forfald</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Faktura</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Tekst</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block>Beløb</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-header> <fo:table-body> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/UnsettledPartnerPosts/PartnerPostDto"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="FiscalDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="PostTypeTranslated"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="Amount" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell id="TableLine" number-columns-spanned="5"/> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Transaction/EconomicTransaction/LedgerPosts/LedgerPost"> <xsl:if test="LedgerAccount = 'Xena_Domain_Income_Accounts_Financial_Costs'"> <fo:block space-before="3mm"> Der beregnes en omkostning på <xfd:field xpath="-Amount"/> kr. for denne betalingspåmindelse. </fo:block> </xsl:if> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> <!-- InvoiceIdentification --> <xsl:if test="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block space-after="10mm" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" id="PaymentLines"> <fo:block>Ved betaling brug venligst betalings-ID:</fo:block> <xsl:for-each select="/Report/Body/Data/Specification/Identifications/InvoiceIdentification"> <fo:block><xfd:field xpath="Identification"/></fo:block> </xsl:for-each> </fo:block> </xsl:if> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>

<xfd:attribute-value object="Logo" attribute="fo:src" dynamic-value="concat('data:image/jpg;base64,',/Report/Logo)"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="FiscalSetupName" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="FiscalSetupOrgNo" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="PrintDate" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TitleCell" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/InvertedTextColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TitleCell" attribute="fo:background-color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="TitleFooter" attribute="fo:background-color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/LightHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="PostsHeader" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/DarkHighlightColour"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="AccountHeader" attribute="fo:color" dynamic-value="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/DarkHighlightTextColour"/>
<xfd:attribute-value object="debetAmount" attribute="fo:visibility" condition="string-length(normalize-space(LedgerPost/LedgerPostDto/Amount)) < 0" value="hidden"/> <xfd:attribute-value object="creditAmount" attribute="fo:visibility" condition="string-length(normalize-space(LedgerPost/LedgerPostDto/Amount)) > 0" value="hidden"/>

<!-- Footer --> <fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after"> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="20pt"> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="1" /> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="2" /> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row border-top-style="solid" border-top-width="0.25pt" border-top-color="rgb(0,0,0)"> <fo:table-cell display-align="center"> <fo:block>Momsafregning</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell display-align="center" text-align="right"> <fo:block> <fo:page-number format="1" />/<fo:page-number-citation format="1" ref-id="xf#theEnd" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:static-content>
<!-- Body --> <fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body"> <!-- Header --> <fo:block> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(50)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block height="3cm"> <fo:external-graphic src="url()" content-height="scale-down-to-fit" id="Logo" height="3cm" width="100%" scaling="uniform"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block font-size="24pt" id="FiscalSetupName"> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/Address/AddressDto/Name"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="14pt" line-height="21pt" id="FiscalSetupOrgNo"> Org: <xfd:field xpath="/Report/FiscalSetup/FiscalSetupDto/OrgNumber"/> </fo:block> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="42pt" id="PrintDate"> Udskrevet: <xfd:field xpath="$XFCrtLocalDateTime"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block>
<!-- Content --> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="15pt"> <!-- Title and criteria table --> <fo:table width="100%" table-layout="fixed"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(15)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(35)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(15)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(35)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-body> <fo:table-row height="1,05cm"> <fo:table-cell padding="2pt" number-columns-spanned="4" display-align="center" text-align="center" id="TitleCell"> <fo:block font-size="14pt"> Momsafregning </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block > Periode start: </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPeriodStartDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> Bilagsnr: </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/SettlementVoucherNumber"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Periode slut:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPeriodEndDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block>Forfaldsdato:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/DueDateDaysFriendly"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> <fo:table-row height="2pt" padding-after="1,5cm"> <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="4" id="TitleFooter"></fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row> </fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block>
<!-- Posts --> <fo:block font-size="11pt" line-height="13pt"> <fo:table padding-bottom="30px"> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="1"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="2"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="3"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="4"/> <fo:table-column column-width="proportional-column-width(20.0)" column-number="5"/> <fo:table-body>

<!-- Posts --> <xfd:table-row-repeat xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/VatPosts/VatSettlementPostDto"> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="VatAbbreviation"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="Basis" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="AmountSettled" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="PrimoAdjustment" format="number:#.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block text-align="right"> <xfd:field xpath="TotalAmount" format="number:#.##0,00 th:. dec:,"/> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </xfd:table-row-repeat>
<!-- Total --> <fo:table-row border-top-width="0.25pt" border-top-style="solid" font-family="Calibri" font-weight="bold" > <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2"> <fo:block>I alt for perioden:</fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell text-align="right"> <fo:block> <xfd:field xpath="/Report/Body/Data/VatDeclarationData/Settlement/VatSettlementTransactionDto/TotalSettled" format="number:##.##0,00 th:. dec:, sign:" /> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> <fo:table-cell> <fo:block> </fo:block> </fo:table-cell> </fo:table-row>
</fo:table-body> </fo:table> </fo:block> </fo:flow> </fo:page-sequence> </xfd:document>
